resources.string: "Have you felt restless, nervous or impatient consistently in the last couple of months?"
"In the span of the past one week, have you experienced a feeling of great self confidence and self appraisal \n while other times these feelings strongly decreased?"
"Are you suffering from insomnia(difficulty falling asleep or maintaining sleep) \n or hypersomnia (excessively prolonged and deep sleep) ?"
"Have you experienced any traumatic event that still lingers in your mind too frequently \n or sometimes replays itself in your dreams?"
"Are you ever getting feelings of being trapped in your life or as though you have \n lost touch with the real world?"

Mental disorders vary over a wide range of mental health conditions that affect mood, thinking and overall behaviour.\n They comprise a broad range of problems with different symptoms, some more severe than others.

Friendships are valuable as we may talk to friends in confidence about things we would not discuss with other people.\n Find friends you can talk to and listen to, to help cope with or recover from various disorders.
A psychiatrist is a physician devoted to the diagnosis, prevention, study and treatment of mental disorders.\n Meet and talk to psychologists to help improve your mental health.
results of the test shown here…Proceed to share with other people with similar diagnoses and specialists as well
Congratulations. You have successfully completed the T4G evaluation test. Click the button below. Disclaimer:blah blah blah

Before starting, please take the evaluation test provided which is designed for several mental disorders.\nThis test is solely aimed at identifying the disorder you are most likely portraying.\nWe then present to you suitable friends and specialists.
